description.en: Looks and smells like Sonarr but made for music

steps.content:
services:
  server:
    image: linuxserver/lidarr:3.1.0
    restart: on-failure
    ports:
    - 8686:8686
    volumes:
    - ${APP_DATA_DIR}/data/config:/config
    - ${DATA_DIR}/storage/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
    - PUID=1000
    - PGID=1000
  mac:
    image: getumbrel/media-app-configurator:v1.3.0
    restart: on-failure
    volumes:
    - ${APP_DATA_DIR}/data/config:/config
    - ${DATA_DIR}/storage/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
      APP_ID: lidarr
      APP_URL: http://lidarr_server_1:8686
      TRANSMISSION_HOST: transmission_server_1
      TRANSMISSION_PORT: '9091'
      ROOT_FOLDER: /downloads/music
      QBITTORRENT_INSTALLED: ${APP_LIDARR_QBITTORRENT_INSTALLED:-"false"}
      QBITTORRENT_HOST: qbittorrent_server_1
      QBITTORRENT_PORT: '8080'
      SABNZBD_INSTALLED: ${APP_LIDARR_SABNZBD_INSTALLED:-"false"}
      SABNZBD_HOST: sabnzbd_web_1
      SABNZBD_PORT: '8080'
      SABNZBD_API_KEY: ${APP_LIDARR_SABNZBD_API_KEY:-""}
    user: 1000:1000

en.description: Looks and smells like Sonarr but made for music
